mapper.insert: insert into user_credit_account(user_id, total_amount, available_amount, account_status, create_time, update_time) values (#{userId}, #{totalAmount}, #{availableAmount}, #{accountStatus}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update user_credit_account set available_amount = available_amount + #{availableAmount}, total_amount = total_amount + #{availableAmount}, update_time = now() where user_id = #{userId}
